Package cycling

Class ClimbSegment

java.lang.Object
cycling.Segment
cycling.ClimbSegment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ClimbSegment extends Segment
Class for ClimbSegemt extents Segment. Stores additional details requted if the segment is a climbing segment.
See Also:
